desc: Considerably restores HP each turn, HC gained boosts BB gauge once per turn & 30% boost to Rec, max HP

dictionary.lore: A device Noel discovered and converted into a Sphere when developing the Frontier Gate. On discovering radioactive materials produced with otherworldly technologies while investigating its interior, Noel transferred the material to a unique catalyst. He then detected high levels of life energy from it, and proceeded to modify the device into a Sphere. It has manifested self-repairing functions, and Noel continues to mutter about room for further study.

name: Curative Device
